abstract: “One of my dorm mates in 10th grade is running for president also, Jeb Bush. We had some spirited games of Ping-Pong and our paths have not crossed much since high school, but I think we still consider each other friends.” — Lincoln Chafee

headline.main: Verbatim: Lincoln Chafee on His High School Years With Jeb Bush

snippet: “One of my dorm mates in 10th grade is running for president also, Jeb Bush. We had some spirited games of Ping-Pong and our paths have not crossed much since high school, but I think we still consider each other friends.” — Lincoln Chafee
